org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup 
    Class and Description
    BackupCopyJob
    Backup copy job is a part of a backup process.
    BackupInfo
    An object to encapsulate the information for each backup session
    BackupInfo.BackupPhase
    BackupPhase - phases of an ACTIVE backup session (running), when state of a backup session is BackupState.RUNNING
    BackupInfo.BackupState
    Backup session states
    BackupInfo.Filter 
    BackupMergeJob
    Backup merge operation job interface.
    BackupRequest
    POJO class for backup request
    BackupRequest.Builder 
    BackupRestoreConstants.BackupCommand 
    BackupTableInfo
    Backup related information encapsulated for a table.
    BackupType 
    HFileArchiver.File
    Wrapper to handle file operations uniformly
    HFileArchiver.FileConverter
    Adapt a type to match the HFileArchiver.File interface, which is used internally for handling archival/removal of files
    HFileArchiver.FileStatusConverter
    Convert a FileStatus to something we can manage in the archiving
    RestoreJob
    Restore operation job interface Concrete implementation is provided by backup provider, see BackupRestoreFactory
    RestoreRequest
    POJO class for restore request
    RestoreRequest.Builder
